name: Mega Black Hole
description:
Your goal? Dodge the different colored asteroids coming from the mega black hole as long as possible! To survive, your ship can change between two colors allowing it to pass through the obstacles of the same color as it. 

The game is playable with 2 people, it's up to you to see who will be the best!

This project was entirely made in C++ using the SFML library !  

Team : 

LETOURNEAU Morigan - Game Developper

MAUPOU Freddy - Game Developper
